title: Plate armour
data:
{{version030}} {{armour |name = Plate armour |cost = |weight = 65 |AC = 10 |EV = 18 |maxenc = +10 |size = Small, Medium |GDR = 39% }} {{flavour|A full suit of solid metal plate: cuirass, pauldrons, vambraces, waist plate and greaves. It provides excellent protection.}} '''Plate armour''' is the heaviest common body armour, providing excellent defense in exchange for [[encumbrance]] (reducing ability to [[spell failure|cast spells]], [[ev]]ade attacks, and fire [[Ranged Weapons]]). Commonly found on monsters, you are virtually guaranteed to find at least one set by the time you've cleared the [[Orcish Mines]]. Plate armour is one of two armour types capable of generating with the [[ponderousness]] [[ego]]. ==Desirability== Plate is often the heaviest armour available, so it's good for strong melee characters. A well-enchanted plate armour with a useful [[ego]] (such as [[fire resistance]]) can serve for the entire 3-rune game. At the very least, heavy fighters won't have better alternatives for a long time. Alternatives do exist: *If you want to branch out into a hybrid fighter/caster, you'll want to switch to a lighter suit of [[dragon scales]]. *Pure-strength characters may eventually end up in [[gold dragon scales]] or [[crystal plate armour]], which are heavier, but provide even more AC. *In any case, both [[storm dragon scales]] and [[shadow dragon scales]] are direct upgrades to a plain, +0 plate armour. Compared to the above, plate armour has the time advantage - you can find it earlier. Waiting for a better set of armour means waiting to use your [[scrolls of enchant armour]], which means making your character weaker ''right now''. As mentioned, if you find a plate armour with a good [[ego]], it may be wise to stick with it for the entire game. In [[shop]]s, plate armour is 4x as expensive as [[chain mail]]. Buying a [[randart]] chain mail can be more cost-effective than plate. ==History== *Prior to [[0.14]], the encumbrance rating was 19. *Prior to [[0.10]], plate armour was known as plate mail. {| class="prettytable" style="border:none; margin:auto; padding:0; text-align: center" ! || Image |- | '''Mundane''' || [[File:Plate1.png]] |- | '''Magical''' || [[File:Plate2.png]] |- | '''Artifact''' || [[File:Plate armour3.png]] |- ! || [[Unrand]]art
